Uses of Class
com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service.Request

  • Packages that use Request 
    Package Description
    com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service
    General Watson service and HTTP exception classes

    • Uses of Request in com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service

      Methods in com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service that return Request 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Request Request.Delete(String url, Object... args)
      The DELETE method requests that the origin server delete the resource identified by the Request-URI.
      static Request Request.Get(String url, Object... args)
      The GET method means retrieve whatever information (in the form of an entity) is identified by the Request-URI.
      static Request Request.Post(String url, Object... args)
      The POST request method is designed to request that a web server accept the data enclosed in the request message's body for storage.
      static Request Request.Put(String url, Object... args)
      The PUT method requests that the enclosed entity be stored under the supplied Request-URI.
      Request Request.withContent(com.google.gson.JsonObject json)
      Adds a JSON content to the request (used with POST/PUT).
      Request Request.withContent(String content, String contentType)
      Adds string content to the request (used with POST/PUT).
      Request Request.withEntity(org.apache.http.HttpEntity entity)
      Adds an arbitrary entity to the request (used with POST/PUT).
      Request Request.withForm(Object... args)
      Adds form parameters.
      Request Request.withHeader(Object... args)
      Adds header parameters.
      Request Request.withQuery(Object... args)
      Adds query parameters.
